channel.description: Numerical Input text_one = input("Enter the price of one item: ") price = float(text_one) text_two = input("Enter the quantity of items: ") quantity = int(text_two) cost = price * quantity print("The total cost is $", end="") print(cost) Numerical Input text_one = input("Enter the price of one item: ") price = float(text_one) text_two = input("Enter the quantity of items: ") quantity = int(text_two) cost = price * quantity print("The total cost is $"
